content: अपे [अप-इ] {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To go away, depart, withdraw, retire, run away, escape; अपेहि begone, avaunt, away, hence, get you gone; to disappear, vanish, pass away; die or perish also; धर्मश्चापैति <ls>Ms. 1. 82</ls>; हृदयात्प्रत्यादेशव्यलीकमपैतु ते <ls>Ś. 7. 24</ls>; रम्या नवद्युतिरपैति न शाद्वलेभ्यः <ls>Ki. 5. 37</ls> does not leave. {@--2@} To be wanting, be omitted; be deprived of, be free from. {@--3@} To start (<ab>Ved.</ab>)
